meanings.definition: A system of high-speed roads in Germany.
meanings.sent1: The autobahns in Germany allow cars to travel very fast.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy driving on the autobahns to experience high speeds.
meanings.sent3: I pretended to race on the autobahns with my toy cars.
meanings.sent4: Life is like navigating through autobahns, always moving forward at full speed.
meanings.sent5: The autobahns stretch out like ribbons of speed across the German landscape.

meanings.definition: The Autobahn is known for its lack of speed limits.
meanings.sent1: Driving on the Autobahn without speed limits can be thrilling.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of experiencing the freedom of the Autobahn's unrestricted speeds.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the Autobahn was the only place where I could drive as fast as a rocket.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced down the Autobahn of imagination, unrestricted and free.
meanings.sent5: The Autobahn beckons with promises of limitless velocity.

meanings.definition: We drove on the autobahns to get to our destination quickly.
meanings.sent1: Our journey was swift as we sped along the autobahns.
meanings.sent2: The autobahns helped us reach our destination in record time.
meanings.sent3: I compared our speedy trip on the autobahns to a cheetah sprinting towards its prey.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by on the autobahns like a bird soaring through the sky.
meanings.sent5: The autobahns were our express lane to our quick getaway.
